title: What would be the expected price of a OnePlus Nord N10? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi OnePlus Nord N10 Expected to be launched on Oct 26, 2020. This is 6 GB RAM / 128 GB internal storage base variant of OnePlus Nord N10 which is expected to available in Black, Gold colour.OnePlus Nord N10 price in India is expected to be Rs. 19,990 Thanks Please Upvoted if you like this
Hi there! OnePlus Nord N10 is expected to launch under 20k. However, this might be wrong as the Phone is not launched yet. Thanks!
According to the specification sheet leaked the OnePlus Nord N10 is expected to be released at around $350 to $400.
